name: Tricks And Treats HD (Premium)
description:
Welcome to the midnight party of Tricks and Treats!

Design your own spooky mansion and host devilishly fun party in the engaging puzzle game.

We expect all members of our big family to come. Some of them are coming from Europe, some from India, some from South America. And they're all coming this way!
Hurry up! We have to prepare the house for the guests!

- Work your way through challenging puzzle levels in this engaging puzzle game.
- Earn lots of gold and silver to buy new upgrades.
- Use your Match 3 skills and awesome power-ups to set the highest score!
